law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 4. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Board of education to make rules and regulations.
